name: Oracle System
description: ORC is a token that can be used for transaction fees by using cryptocurrency ATMs. By innovating the existing cash - cryptocurrency deposit ATM technology, ORC's goal is to support P2P financing between users and to implement De-fi based on ATM devices. ORC has signed an agreement with BTM (Bitcoin-ATM) and plans to install BTM devices in 10 major tourist destinations in Korea and will also be revealing a supporting cryptocurrency OTC application.
